document.discussion_title: Fat to Fit: Final day preview
document.topic_text: We will be showing the final part of our special childhood obesity series tonight on ITV Channel TV. Over the last four days, we've been following the progress of three young boys from Jersey on their journey from fat to fit. Well it's D-Day for Noah, Senna and Harrison. Today they will turn up for their final weigh-ins. He's a preview of what they've been up to so far. Play video So have they managed to lose weight, reduce their body fat and get fit? Tune in to Channel TV tonight at 6pm to see if they've been successful. Last updated Fri 12 Aug 2016 Read more 12 updates Fat to Fit: Fighting Childhood Obesity Health Jersey
